ModMetaData.name: Quasimorph - Civil Resistance armoury
ModMetaData.author: SoldierGG1
ModMetaData.description: Hey hey people. SGG1 here, I am here to ask if you love the state sponsored slavery where at anytime they can muzzle you and beat you at any infriction of offense you may or may not have committed and if you don't, get used to it because today I declare my support for the glorious return to state by smuggling in a civil resistence's weapon to rim rim, Enjoy.
